Html:
If I am building a WPF app only, should I be using Prism v1 or v2?  If v1, can you briefly explain why?

Tks much.

Hi,

I would recommend using Prism-v2, as some new features were introduced in v2 aside from support for Silverlight; and nonetheless, it is designed to work with WPF.

You can check this document to see some of those new features, if you are interested.

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi

Thanks Guido.  I thought this was the case but was just looking for confirmation that v2 was not for Silverlight only, etc.

Tks.
